MIME media type name : Application

None

Encoding considerations : 7bit

Security considerations :
The content is plain text, and is not active or executable. The content
does not require privacy or integrity services.

Interoperability considerations :
None. Only intended to be used by IOCOM Visimeet.

Published specification :
The specification of the .igm content is proprietary and is only
intended to be used between elements of the IOCOM Visimeet
collaboration solution.

Applications which use this media :
IOCOM Visimeet video collaboration software.

Additional information :

2. File extension(s) : .igm
